arts.ttl: Mark Robins blasts 'unacceptable' Stoke City performance in loss to Norwich
arts.sum: Mark Robins warned Stoke City will get punished if they sit off teams as much as they did in the first half at Norwich or lose discipline like they did in the second. Robins was disappointed with the team work on show in terms of how Stoke ran off the ball – and that there were players who were then doing their own thing.

arts.ttl: 'We can get sixth' - Norwich fans react to Stoke win
arts.sum: Watch Norwich City fans react to the Canaries' 4-2 Championship win over Stoke City at Carrow Road.

arts.ttl: Paddy's Pointers: Four observations after Norwich's handsome Stoke romp
arts.sum: Pink Un editor Paddy Davitt delivers his Stoke City verdict after the Canaries 4-2 Championship rout.

arts.ttl: Stoke player ratings vs Norwich as Lewis Baker left cursing key decision
arts.sum: Stoke had already levelled once by Ali Al-Hamadi seizing on hopeless defending from Shane Duffy and Lewis Baker going through to score and they thought they had done it again for a second equaliser only for Baker to be flagged offside although the ball through came from Duffy, deflected by Jose Cordoba. Lewis Dobbin had opened the scoring when he was gifted space by Junior Tchamadeu and Ashley Phillips; Josh Sargent had got the second when Enda Stevens had been beaten too easily; Sargent got the third when he made space at the drop of a hat on the edge of the box; and a fourth sealed it when Marcelino Nunez’s pass deflected off Tchamadeu’s foot and looped into the far top corner.

arts.ttl: Josh Sargent at the double as Norwich too strong for Stoke
arts.sum: The American now has seven goals in six games.

arts.ttl: STARTING XIs: Dobbin starts as Norwich make three changes for Stoke game
arts.sum: Full team news and starting line-ups ahead of Norwich City's Championship meeting with Stoke City at Carrow Road.

arts.ttl: Stoke City team news vs Norwich as Mark Robins makes three changes
arts.sum: Stoke: Johansson, Tchamadeu, Stevens, Rose, Phillips, Pearson, Seko, Baker, Moran, Junho, Al-Hamadi. In come Enda Stevens, Tatsuki Seko and Lewis Baker as Stoke look to build on that victory and edge themselves up the Championship table.

arts.ttl: MATCHDAY LIVE: Norwich City v Stoke City
arts.sum: Follow live updates and join the debate at Carrow Road as Norwich City face Hull in the Championship.

arts.ttl: Norwich City vs Stoke City live - Team news from Carrow Road - Stoke-on-Trent Live
arts.sum: Norwich are four points adrift of the top six after drawing two and losing one of their last three games. Mark Robins brings his squad east on the back of two wins in his last three league games as they try to shift clear of the danger zone and towards mid-table.

arts.ttl: Robin Sainty: The great Norwich City debate is starting to become more clear
arts.sum: Norwich City columnist Robin Sainty believes we have arrived at the stage of the season where the divergence of opinion between those whose glass is half full and those whose is half empty becomes particularly marked.
